name: Sasuke's Journey to Egypt
description:
Sasuke Sarutobi, in order to obtain a sword to slay the dragon.

He travels back in time to 2000 AD and travels around the world.

The last time I visited Neo-Shanghai, it was filled with gorgeous culture.

However, even after asking around the city, he couldn't find any clues that would lead him to the existence of the sword.

I was about to leave Neo Shanghai.

An anthropologist stopped me.

Apparently, a "dragon slaying sword" had appeared in the legend passed down by the Egyptian people.

Based on this story, Sasuke leaves for Egypt.

As I walked with my camel through the empty desert of Egypt, I had an unexpected encounter with the unknown.
